description: Signal processing involves the analysis, interpretation, and manipulation of signals to extract useful information. This is particularly important in applications such as sensor data analysis, where real-time processing and efficient resource usage are critical.
you_have_this_if: You are working with real-time sensor data.
You need to preserve both detailed and overall trends in your data.
You are using energy-harvesting IoT devices.
You require efficient data processing methods.

approaches.best_for: When you need to analyze sensor data in real-time with limited computational resources while preserving detailed trends.
approaches.key_tradeoff: This method balances the need for detailed analysis with the constraints of limited computational power.

decision_matrix.best_when: You need to process real-time sensor data efficiently without sacrificing detail.

start_here: The recommended first approach for most cases is the Wavelet-based edge computing method, as it effectively handles real-time data with limited resources while maintaining accuracy.
